food_addiction_and_performance.description: How food choices impact athletic performance and overall well-being.
examples: The more raw food you consume, the better your performance and energy levels.
Food addiction is one of the most difficult addictions to overcome.
Transitioning to a fruitarian diet helped improve running performance.

transitioning_to_plant_based.description: The journey to adopting a plant-based diet and its effects on performance.
examples: Discovering plant-based nutrition through books and research led to a sudden dietary shift.
T Colin Campbell's work was a major influence in adopting a vegan lifestyle.
Documentaries like Earthlings and Cowspiracy reinforced the ethical and environmental reasons for staying plant-based.

impact_of_diet_on_running.description: How diet choices directly impact running endurance and speed.
examples: Switching to a plant-based diet improved recovery and race performance.
A fruitarian approach provided faster digestion and lighter energy levels for long runs.
Racing on watermelon juice alone led to multiple personal bests.

eliminating_oil_for_performance.description: Why removing oil from the diet benefits endurance athletes.
examples: Oil damages the endothelial lining and impairs blood flow.
Nitric oxide function is hindered by oil and caffeine, reducing oxygen delivery to muscles.
Cold-pressed oils turn rancid quickly and do not provide health benefits comparable to whole foods.

mindset_and_holistic_living.description: The role of mental conditioning and lifestyle alignment in achieving peak performance.
examples: Training and racing success stems from mindset and belief, not just physical ability.
Holistic living involves aligning health, spirituality, and personal growth for long-term fulfillment.
Taking control of thoughts and values leads to better training consistency and life satisfaction.

kelvin_kiptums_legacy.description: Lessons from the life and untimely passing of record-breaking marathoner Kelvin Kiptum.
examples: Kiptumâ€™s passing reminds us that now is the time to pursue our goals.
The journey and impact of an athlete matter more than the records they achieve.
His career showed that breaking limits is about belief and perseverance.
